attributes.action: Abolish All Animal Cruelty from Slaughterhouses to Dairy Industry, Fishing to Animal Experimentation.
attributes.additional_details:
Abolish All Animal Cruelty from Slaughterhouses to Dairy Industry, Fishing to Animal Experimentation.

Peaceful Plates for a Peaceful Planet is a World Wide Initiative to better the treatment of people and animals by focusing at the very heart and base of all world problems, which is the way that those most at our mercy, are treated.

The Meat and Dairy Industry has proven not only cruel and absolutely ridiculous in terms of treatment of living beings and by this day and age people need to be more consciously aware of this.

These industries have been proven (obviously) to create health problems in those perpetuating the cycle of cruelty.

We believe that in this day and age, there is no excuse for this.

For world wide peace as well as basic animal rights being upheld. This will affect all populations extending beyond the animal kingdom and it is time that fair treatment of all beings beyond their race, religion, non-religion, sex and species, is achieved.
